description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、政治理论家、经济学家与革命社会主义者，马克思主义的创始人之一。
description.en: A German philosopher, political theorist, economist, and revolutionary socialist, one of the founders of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 德国社会主义者，马克思最亲密的朋友和长期合作伙伴。
description.en: A German socialist, Marx's closest friend and long-term collaborator.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思的妻子，出身于普鲁士贵族家庭。
description.en: The wife of Karl Marx, from a Prussian aristocratic family.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思的父亲，一位接受启蒙运动思想的律师。
description.en: Karl Marx's father, a lawyer who embraced Enlightenment ideas.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思的母亲，出身于荷兰一个富裕的商人家庭。
description.en: Karl Marx's mother, from a wealthy Dutch merchant family.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪的德意志邦国，马克思的出生地。
description.en: A German kingdom in the 19th century, Marx's birthplace.

description.zh-cn: 位于普鲁士王国的城市，卡尔·马克思的出生地。
description.en: A city in the Kingdom of Prussia, the birthplace of Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 英国首都，马克思长期流亡、进行研究和最终逝世的地方。
description.en: The capital of the United Kingdom, where Marx lived in exile for a long time, conducted his research, and eventually died.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1835年至1836年就读的大学。
description.en: The university Marx attended from 1835 to 1836.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1836年至1841年就读的大学，在此期间深受黑格尔哲学影响。
description.en: The university Marx attended from 1836 to 1841, where he was deeply influenced by Hegelian philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 1841年授予马克思哲学博士学位的大学。
description.en: The university that awarded Marx his PhD in Philosophy in 1841.

nodes.id: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，其辩证法思想对马克思产生了深远影响。
description.en: A German philosopher whose dialectical method profoundly influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 一个激进的思想家团体，从左翼视角批判当时的社会、政治与宗教体制，马克思曾是其中一员。
description.en: A group of radical thinkers who criticized the social, political, and religious institutions of their time from a left-wing perspective, of which Marx was a member.

description.zh-cn: 青年黑格尔派的领导人物之一，马克思早期的朋友，后成为其批判对象。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Young Hegelians, an early friend of Marx who later became a target of his criticism.

description.zh-cn: 由正义者同盟改组而成的国际无产阶级政党，委托马克思和恩格斯起草了《共产党宣言》。
description.en: An international proletarian political party reorganized from the League of the Just, which commissioned Marx and Engels to write The Communist Manifesto.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在联合各国工人阶级进行斗争的国际组织，马克思是其创始人和核心领导人之一。
description.en: An international organization aiming to unite the working classes of different countries for struggle, of which Marx was a founder and one of its key leaders.

description.zh-cn: 由马克思和恩格斯为共产主义者同盟撰写的纲领性文件，系统阐述了马克思主义的核心思想。
description.en: A programmatic document written by Marx and Engels for the Communist League, which systematically elaborates the core ideas of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 马克思最重要的经济学著作，对资本主义生产方式进行了深入的批判性分析。
description.en: Marx's most important economic work, which provides a deep critical analysis of the capitalist mode of production.

description.zh-cn: 由马克思和恩格斯共同创立的思想体系，对世界产生了深远影响。
description.en: A system of thought co-founded by Marx and Engels that has had a profound impact on the world.

description.zh-cn: 俄国革命家和无政府主义理论家，在第一国际中与马克思展开了激烈的斗争。
description.en: A Russian revolutionary and anarchist theorist who engaged in a fierce struggle with Marx within the First International.

description.zh-cn: 科隆的激进派报刊，马克思曾于1842年担任其主编，后被普鲁士政府查禁。
description.en: A radical newspaper in Cologne, where Marx served as editor in 1842 before it was banned by the Prussian government.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义哲学的核心组成部分，认为社会发展的基础是物质生产方式。
description.en: A core component of Marxist philosophy, which holds that the basis of social development is the material mode of production.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义的核心概念，认为人类社会的历史是通过阶级之间的斗争实现的。
description.en: A core concept of Marxism, which posits that the history of human society is realized through the struggle between classes.

description.zh-cn: 1848年在欧洲爆发的一系列革命浪潮，马克思积极支持并参与了相关活动。
description.en: A series of revolutionary waves that broke out in Europe in 1848, which Marx actively supported and participated in.

description.zh-cn: 法国无政府社会主义者，其思想在《哲学的贫困》中受到马克思的批判。
description.en: A French anarcho-socialist whose ideas were criticized by Marx in 'The Poverty of Philosophy'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1847年出版的著作，旨在回应和批判皮埃尔-约瑟夫·蒲鲁东的《贫困的哲学》。
description.en: A book published by Marx in 1847, intended as a response and critique to Pierre-Joseph Proudhon's 'The Philosophy of Poverty'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思与恩格斯合作撰写的第一部著作，批判了青年黑格尔派的代表人物布鲁诺·鲍威尔。
description.en: The first collaborative work by Marx and Engels, criticizing Bruno Bauer, a leading figure of the Young Hegelians.

description.zh-cn: 1871年巴黎市民发动的起义，建立了短暂的工人阶级政权，马克思在《法兰西内战》中为其正名。
description.en: An uprising by the citizens of Paris in 1871 that established a short-lived working-class government, which Marx defended in 'The Civil War in France'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思为第一国际撰写的小册子，分析并支持了1871年的巴黎公社运动。
description.en: A pamphlet written by Marx for the First International, analyzing and supporting the Paris Commune of 1871.

description.zh-cn: 美国报纸，马克思在1852年至1862年间担任其欧洲通讯员。
description.en: An American newspaper for which Marx served as a European correspondent from 1852 to 1862.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家和人类学家，其唯物主义思想对青年马克思产生了重要影响，但马克思后来在《关于费尔巴哈的提纲》中对其进行了批判。
description.en: A German philosopher and anthropologist whose materialist ideas significantly influenced the young Marx, though Marx later criticized him in 'Theses on Feuerbach'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1845年写下的11条简短笔记，标志着他与费尔巴哈哲学的决裂和历史唯物主义的形成，其中第十一条尤为著名。
description.en: A set of eleven brief notes written by Marx in 1845, marking his break with Feuerbach's philosophy and the formation of historical materialism, with the eleventh thesis being particularly famous.

description.zh-cn: 海因里希·马克思是卡尔·马克思的父亲。
description.en: Heinrich Marx was Karl Marx's father.

description.zh-cn: 亨丽埃特·普莱斯堡是卡尔·马克思的母亲。
description.en: Henriette Pressburg was Karl Marx's mother.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思与燕妮·冯·威斯特华伦于1843年结婚，直至1881年燕妮去世。
description.en: Karl Marx married Jenny von Westphalen in 1843, and they were married until her death in 1881.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思于1818年5月5日出生于普鲁士王国的特里尔市。
description.en: Karl Marx was born in the city of Trier, Kingdom of Prussia, on May 5, 1818.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1835年至1836年在波恩大学学习法学。
description.en: Marx studied law at the University of Bonn from 1835 to 1836.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1836年至1841年在柏林大学学习法学和哲学，并加入了青年黑格尔派的“博士俱乐部”。
description.en: Marx studied law and philosophy at the University of Berlin from 1836 to 1841, and joined the Young Hegelians' 'Doctor's Club'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思向耶拿大学提交了博士论文，并于1841年4月获得哲学博士学位。
description.en: Marx submitted his doctoral dissertation to the University of Jena and was awarded a Doctor of Philosophy degree in April 1841.

relationships.source: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 马克思深受黑格尔哲学的影响，他批判地继承了其辩证法思想，并将其与唯物主义结合，形成了自己的哲学体系。
description.en: Marx was deeply influenced by Hegel's philosophy; he critically inherited its dialectical method and combined it with materialism to form his own philosophical system.

description.zh-cn: 在柏林大学期间，马克思加入了由激进思想家组成的青年黑格尔派，并与其中成员深入交往。
description.en: During his time at the University of Berlin, Marx joined the Young Hegelians, a group of radical thinkers, and became deeply involved with its members.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1844年8月28日在巴黎与恩格斯相遇，从此开始了他们终生的友谊与合作。
description.en: Marx met Engels in Paris on August 28, 1844, beginning their lifelong friendship and collaboration.

description.zh-cn: 马克思是共产主义者同盟的核心成员，并与恩格斯共同为其起草了纲领《共产党宣言》。
description.en: Marx was a key member of the Communist League and co-authored its program, The Communist Manifesto, with Engels.

description.zh-cn: 马克思于1864年参与创立了国际工人协会（第一国际），并成为其核心领导人。
description.en: Marx participated in the founding of the International Workingmen's Association (the First International) in 1864 and became its central leader.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思与弗里德里希·恩格斯合作撰写了《共产党宣言》。
description.en: Karl Marx co-authored The Communist Manifesto with Friedrich Engels.

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·恩格斯与卡尔·马克思合作撰写了《共产党宣言》。
description.en: Friedrich Engels co-authored The Communist Manifesto with Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思撰写了其毕生力作《资本论》，系统地分析和批判了资本主义生产方式。
description.en: Karl Marx wrote his life's work, Das Kapital, in which he systematically analyzed and critiqued the capitalist mode of production.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思与弗里德里希·恩格斯共同创立了马克思主义思想体系。
description.en: Karl Marx, together with Friedrich Engels, founded the ideological system of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·恩格斯与卡尔·马克思共同创立了马克思主义思想体系。
description.en: Friedrich Engels, together with Karl Marx, founded the ideological system of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 在第一国际内部，马克思与无政府主义派系领袖米哈伊尔·巴枯宁展开了激烈的路线斗争。
description.en: Within the First International, Marx engaged in a fierce ideological struggle against the anarchist faction leader, Mikhail Bakunin.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思创立了历史唯物主义，将其作为自己哲学和历史观的基础。
description.en: Karl Marx founded historical materialism, making it the basis of his philosophy and view of history.

description.zh-cn: 在俄国沙皇尼古拉一世的施压下，普鲁士政府于1843年3月查禁了由马克思主编的《莱茵报》。
description.en: Under pressure from Russian Tsar Nicholas I, the Prussian government banned the Rheinische Zeitung, edited by Marx, in March 1843.

description.zh-cn: 马克思积极支持1848年欧洲革命，并返回德国科隆创办《新莱茵报》以传播革命思想。
description.en: Marx actively supported the 1848 European revolutions and returned to Cologne, Germany, to found the Neue Rheinische Zeitung to spread revolutionary ideas.

description.zh-cn: 在1845年出版的《神圣家族》中，马克思和恩格斯批判了他们昔日的朋友、青年黑格尔派哲学家布鲁诺·鲍威尔的思想。
description.en: In 'The Holy Family', published in 1845, Marx and Engels criticized the ideas of their former friend and Young Hegelian philosopher, Bruno Bauer.

description.zh-cn: 马克思在其著作《哲学的贫困》中，对法国无政府社会主义者皮埃尔-约瑟夫·蒲鲁东的“小资产阶级哲学”进行了系统性批判。
description.en: In his work 'The Poverty of Philosophy', Marx systematically criticized the 'petty-bourgeois philosophy' of the French anarcho-socialist Pierre-Joseph Proudhon.

description.zh-cn: 马克思在其著作《法兰西内战》中为1871年的巴黎公社运动进行了辩护和正名。
description.en: In his work 'The Civil War in France', Marx defended and justified the Paris Commune of 1871.

description.zh-cn: 在流亡伦敦期间，马克思从1852年到1862年担任《纽约每日论坛报》的欧洲通讯员以获取收入。
description.en: During his exile in London, Marx served as a European correspondent for the New York Daily Tribune from 1852 to 1862 to earn an income.

description.zh-cn: 马克思通过《关于费尔巴哈的提纲》批判了路德维希·费尔巴哈的旧唯物主义，并阐述了其实践唯物主义的观点，标志着他与费尔巴哈哲学的决裂。
description.en: Through 'Theses on Feuerbach', Marx criticized Ludwig Feuerbach's old materialism and elaborated on his own practical materialism, marking his break with Feuerbach's philosophy.
